experience: You and Antony both know John Furrier, Mark Zawacki, and 4 others
Antony can introduce you to 3 people at IntelliCorp

Provided consulting services to several small to mid-size software companies. An example project is Ephox.com where I held the role of VP of Sales and Marketing for three years. During that tenure, I helped the company grow its revenues 400%.  The company was named on the Inc 500 list. I led a sales effort to have IBM resell Ephox software - which resulted in a multi-million dollar transaction.

Founded and run the company - an innovator in the global sourcing market. Company was awarded numerous accolades such as Enterprise Outlook 100 and Supply Chain 100. Technology was acquired by UPS and is still in use today.
Hired to grow sales at this startup specializing in SAP systems management. Grew quarterly revenues by 300% during tenure. Company was acquired by Keynote Systems.
Promoted to the position of Vice President of this public company to turn-around sales in North America. Increased quarterly revenues from $1.7 to $7.2M in 8 quarters.
Promoted to manage Oracles worldwide distributors. Managed one of Oracles most profitable business units.
